document.full_text: lawmakers from both sides of the aisle expressed skepticism on thursday that at&t's proposed buy of t-mobile usa would lead to the consumer benefits that the wireless company has promised.
document.title: republicans, democrats skeptical of at&t deal
lines_and_colors: lawmakers from both sides of the aisle expressed skepticism on thursday that at&t's proposed buy of t-mobile usa would lead to the consumer benefits that the wireless company has promised.
